title: Inclusive Education Design for Students with Disabilities in Higher Education: Reflective Teaching Practices for Inclusivity

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of higher education and foundational awareness of disability rights
context.additional_context: For aspiring professionals in medical/legal/technical fields, emphasizing inclusive strategies for students with disabilities in social studies domains, utilizing smartphone-accessible resources

learning_goals: Cultivating the ability to design lessons that promote learning engagement for students with disabilities by applying core principles of reflective pedagogy.
Propose at least three instructional strategies for operating classes using flexible teaching methods and Universal Design for Learning (UDL).
Establish a continuous reflection and action plan for improving inclusive classes for students with disabilities through formative assessment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
